name: Taco Adventure
description:
You play as a cat and the goal is to get as many tacos as possible before burning to death. Email me your high scores at catsofthegraveyard4@gmail.com, or comment the on the post in the comment thingy.

Music: Ontopic https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEeSHOA3MP2XPSXLYZzHj4g
